name: concertbrite
description: * This is a clone of Eventbrite. * The user can see all the concerts and register for concerts they want to go to. * The scorecard link: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1t3ALQ6TqlZq9GcEoZMm92-g6ff3lTu_El4Rll_kO9j4/edit?usp=sharing

scripts.install: npm --prefix backend install backend && npm --prefix frontend install frontend
